remarks: Closure of scalar product for a left module.  ( ~ hvmulcl analog.) (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmodvscl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodvscl.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lmodvscl.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lmodvscl.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lmodvscl $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( R .x. X ) e. V ) $.
